version_description:
v2.4.2(2257)
- Bug fixes.

- Added:
Pantone+ Extended Gamut Coated,
Pantone FHI Cotton 210 New Colors,
Pantone FHI Paper TPG, and
Pantone Metallics Coated fan decks.

- Updated:
Pantone Formula Guide Coated,
Pantone Formula Guide Uncoated,
Pantone Color Bridge Coated, and
Pantone Color Bridge Uncoated.

- New fan deck page featuring a palette store and in-app purchases of color libraries.
- PANTONE’s 112 new color additions to the PANTONE PLUS SERIES color family are now available for purchase.
- Apple Pay is now enabled in myPANTONE to give users a quick, convenient option to purchase or renew their PANTONE FORMULA GUIDE Coated & Uncoated set at a discounted price exclusive for myPANTONE users on iOS.
- Bug fix
We fixed a bunch of issues. Enjoy!

Introducing PANTONE Studio!

Pantone is thrilled to announce our simple yet bold new step into the digital color space with the launch of PANTONE Studio for iOS on iPhone.

PANTONE Studio will help solve your greatest color challenges: converting the inspiration around you to Pantone, building and testing palettes on designs & materials, and sharing Pantone with your clients, collaborators, and social networks. The app is also now Creative Cloud connected, making delivery of color to your design software workflow easier than ever.

Like our iconic fan deck, Studio is visually simple and fun to use, yet provides useful and enhancing value to any designer with the flexibility and affordability only an app can provide. Studio is free for download with in-app purchase options to subscribe.

Thanks for using PANTONE Studio! We’re continually improving our app to make it more user friendly and productive for all of your color & design needs.

Each update includes enhancements to the underlying performance, tool and feature improvements, and other changes that we’ll highlight here.

Thanks for using PANTONE Studio! We’re continually improving our app to make it more user friendly and productive for all of your color & design needs.

Each update includes enhancements to the underlying performance, tool and feature improvements, and other changes that we’ll highlight here.

Thanks for using PANTONE Studio! We’re continually improving our app to make it more user friendly and productive for all of your color & design needs.

In this update for myPANTONE users only, we are actively working to restore your color access without a subscription. Please go to the Settings menu and hit Restore Purchases. If this does not prompt you with an in-app letter from Pantone and full access, please contact our customer service team at support@pantone.com so that we can get your color restored. We have found that some users require additional steps to restore their color, and our service team is ready to help you as needed.

We're happy to restore access automatically to all Pantone colors for customers who previously purchased the myPantone app, and have fixed a number of bugs.

Inspirational images from Tumblr accounts can now be linked into the app via the images section.

In this release, we've made some improvements to Pantone Studio to prepare the app for iOS 10.

For customers who previously purchased myPantone, we've been able to automatically restore your access to colors and values without subscription. If you purchased myPantone but remain without access, hit the Restore Purchases option in the settings menu and then reset app onboarding to gain access.

We are constantly reading reviews and planning improvements, and encourage you to send us your feedback at support@pantone.com if you have feedback that would help us improve your Pantone Studio experience.

Need an image to accompany your inspiring color or palette? With our latest update, you can now search your device's images for a specific Pantone color via the search feature!

Other new helpful tools include:
- Reordering the colors in your palette via the Studio
- ASE file generation for palettes
- Improved management of Your Collection and maneuverability between color guides
- Sharing images directly to your Creative Cloud account

We've also made a number of bug fixes to improve your experience with Pantone Studio!

We are constantly looking at reviews and take your feedback very seriously. If there's something you'd like us to improve upon or add to Pantone Studio, send us an email at support@pantone.com so that we can address it.

We've made a number of improvements including a streamlined on-boarding experience for new customers, a new shareable palette type and the ability to share articles from the app. Other new improvements include:
- A visualization of each color's spectral curve
- Save a Pantone color as a wallpaper image on your phone
- Improvements to speed up search
- Bug fixes

We've fixed an issue that caused the app to crash for users not on iOS 10 or above.

Our latest release delivers a streamlined on-boarding experience for new customers, a new shareable palette type and the ability to share articles from the app. Other improvements include:
- A visualization of each color's spectral curve
- Save a Pantone color as a wallpaper image on your phone
- Faster search

In this version, we're celebrating Pantone 15-0343 Greenery, our 2017 Color of the Year! The home menu has gone Greenery and we've launched a special Color of the Year guide that features each Color of the Year going back to 2000, available to all customers.

In addition, we've made a number of improvements to enhance your experience:
- Swipe left and right to navigate wherever tabs exist
- Color search results now indicate how they made a match
- Page layout reconfigurations and bug fixes

We're excited to announce the localization of Pantone Studio in Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, and Korean languages. We've also made a number of small improvements and fixes to further stabilize the app.

Have an improvement or an issue with Pantone Studio that you'd like to discuss? Contact our customer service team at support@pantone.com
Pantone Studio's user interface is now translated into Spanish, French, German, Italian, and Portuguese!  We've also made some enhancements to improve overall app performance.
We've updated Pantone Studio for iOS 11 and iPhone X, enjoy!  We've also made some enhancements to improve overall app performance.
We fixed some issues for our Chinese users and optimized the Inspiration section.
Just a few bug fixes. Enjoy!

We welcome an updated PANTONE Metallics guide to Pantone Studio.  PANTONE combines the previous PANTONE Metallics Coated and PANTONE Metallics Premium guides in a single package, while introducing you to 54 new metallic colors.
Bug fixes.
We've made some minor underlying enhancements and improvements to PANTONE Studio.
We've made a few updates and fixes to improve app compatibility with iOS 12, including a fix that prevented some users from starting a free trial.
We welcome PANTONE 16-1546 Living Coral, our 2019 Color of the Year, to the Color of the Year Guide in Pantone Studio.  In addition, we've made a number of bug fixes and enhancements under the hood.
Bug fixes.

We welcome an updated PANTONE Metallics guide to Pantone Studio.  PANTONE combines the previous PANTONE Metallics Coated and PANTONE Metallics Premium guides in a single package, while introducing you to 54 new metallic colors.

We welcome new PANTONE FHI Metallic Shimmers and FHI Polyester TSX guides to Pantone Studio.
In addition to these new guides, we are also pleased to present 294 colors to an updated PANTONE Formula Guide Coated, Formula Guide Uncoated, Color Bridge Coated and Color Bridge Uncoated guides.

The Color of the Year for 2020 has been introduced.
Several small bugs have been resolved.

The Color of the Year for 2020 has been introduced.
Several small bugs have been resolved.
Fashion and product designers rejoice!  315 new Fashion, Home + Interiors colors are launched for the TCX and TPG libraries.  We’ve also fixed a number of bugs and rewired parts of the back end.
Fashion and product designers rejoice!  315 new Fashion, Home + Interiors colors are launched for the TCX and TPG libraries.  We’ve also fixed a number of bugs and rewired parts of the back end.

We fixed a bug that affected the camera.

If you love Studio, check out the new Pantone Connect app, which includes many more great features and extends to web and Adobe extension apps.
